name: MilkQuest
description:
※ This visual novel epic quest contains minor spoilers for Soundless. ※This is our first time doing a web build. It is the suboptimal version and sometimes does not play sound effects or initially generates glitchy images.

EMBARK ON THE GREATEST JOURNEY OF ALL TIME!

Go on a quest with four brave adventurers from across the land! Tasked by Imperial Decree to take down the nefarious DEMON LORD, travelers AUMA, NAJWA, HOTARU, and MEROPE must learn to cooperate to complete their task!

(note: maybe make this description longer idk)

FEATURES (TODO: turn this into a header)

  • Character appearances from Soundless, Three Lilies, 7388, and POLYCHROMANIA!
  • Hardly modified Ren'Py default theme
  • .
  • What else is in this game
  • Not combat like I wanted that's for sure
  • The editor is glitching again fix those bullet points later
  • 1.7k words (INCREDIBLE JOURNEY)
